SEARCH
Package gw.api.system.server

Class ServerUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.system.server.ServerUtil
public class ServerUtil extends Object
Provides access to the current server server info.

  • Method Details

    • getServerId

      public static String getServerId()
      The server id for this server, this is a configuration control option and this might not be unique.
      Returns:
      the serverId

    • getClusterId

      public static String getClusterId()
      Cluster id for this server.
      Returns:
      the clusterId

    • getShardId

      public static String getShardId()
      The shard id assigned to this cluster, if any, or the empty string if this cluster is not sharded. This is a configuration option and is permanent once set. Sharded clusters must have unique names.
      Returns:
      the shardId

    • isReadOnly

      public static boolean isReadOnly()
      A server may start in the Read-Only mode (e.g. during Blue/Green deployment). In the Read-Only mode database modification is not allowed. Usually the server switches to the normal mode after few minutes, so do not cache this flag!
      Returns:
      whether this node is running in Read-Only mode.

    • isReadOnlyCommitExceptionRootCause

      public static boolean isReadOnlyCommitExceptionRootCause(Throwable t)
      Checks if this exception is caused by the attempted commit in the Read-Only mode.
      Parameters:
      t - throwable to check
      Returns:
      true if the root cause is Read-Only commit exception.

    • getEnv

      public static String getEnv()
      This is the env for this server, this is a configuration control option.
      Returns:
      the env

    • getServerVersion

      public static ServerVersion getServerVersion()
      This is the ServerVersion for this server, this is a build artifact for use in logging and determining compatibility.
      Returns:
      the ServerVersion

    • getProduct

      public static GWProduct getProduct()
      This is the product for this server, this is a build artifact for use in logging and determining compatibility.
      Returns:
      the product

    • getAllRoles

      public static Set<String> getAllRoles()
      This is the set of all roles. There is always at least one role defined.
      Returns:
      the set of roles, never null or the empty set.

    • getServerRoles

      public static Set<String> getServerRoles()
      This is the set of server roles enabled for this server. Never returns null. The empty set means no roles are defined for this server.
      Returns:
      the set of server roles, never null

    • systemDateTime

      public static Date systemDateTime()
      Returns system time not affected by time adjustments for testing purposes. Use DateUtil.currentDate() unless you know exactly what you are doing.

    • isRunningInGWCP

      public static boolean isRunningInGWCP()
      Returns true if the server is running in GWCP environment.
      Returns:
      true if the server is running in GWCP environment.

    • getDeploymentId

      public static String getDeploymentId()
      Returns current deployment ID.
      Returns:
      - string version of GRN

    • getDeploymentIdWithValidation

      public static String getDeploymentIdWithValidation()
      Returns current deployment ID, with validation that all fields are filled
      Returns:
      - string version of GRN
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if any GRN fields are not valid

    • isProductionPlanet

      public static boolean isProductionPlanet()
      Returns true if the current deployment ID is for a production planet
      Returns:
      - boolean

    • isLowerPlanet

      public static boolean isLowerPlanet()
      Returns true if the current deployment ID is for a lower planet (not PROD or PREPROD)
      Returns:
      - boolean
